---
title: "CSV Reader"
runtime: shiny
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(reticulate) #need to have Python and Conda installed (easiest way is by installing Anaconda, then adding it to your path)
library(shiny)
library(readxl)
library(here)
```

```{r include=FALSE}
source_python("csv_reader.py")
vendors <- read_excel("ActiveVendors.xls")
vendors <- sort(vendors$NAME)
```


```{r eruptions, echo=FALSE}
inputPanel(
  fileInput("file1", "Choose CSV File",
                multiple = FALSE,
                accept = c("text/csv",
                         "text/comma-separated-values,text/plain",
                         ".csv")),
  selectizeInput("vendorList", "Vendor", vendors, selected = NULL, multiple = FALSE, options = list(
          placeholder = 'Select a vendor',
          onInitialize = I('function() { this.setValue(""); }'))
  )
  
)

observe({
    if(!is.null(input$file1) && input$vendorList != ""){
      inFile <- input$file1
      csv_avt(inFile$name, input$vendorList)
    }
})

renderText({
  if(!is.null(input$file1) && input$vendorList != ""){
    "Template Created"
  }
})

```
